metadata.title: CVE-2017-6949 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: An issue was discovered in CHICKEN Scheme through 4.12.0. When using anonstandard CHICKEN-specific extension to allocate an SRFI-4 vector inunmanaged memory, the vector size would be used in unsanitised form as anargument to malloc(). With an unexpected size, the impact may have been asegfault or buffer overflow.

criterions.comment: chicken package in xenial is affected and needs fixing.
